title.rendered: Job Openings In Digital Marketing Domain In Chennai

content.rendered:
[vc_row pix_particles_check=””][vc_column][vc_column_text]If you are someone living in Chennai & looking for a Job Openings In Digital Marketing Domain In Chennai then you have come to the Right Place. As in this article, we will provide you with the scope & the various Job Openings In Digital Marketing Domain In Chennai. So stay tuned. Read Also: Job Openings In Digital Marketing Domain In Noida Located at the coromandel city of Bay of Bengal, Chennai is among one of the largest educational, cultural, and educational cities in the southern part of India. Being developed as the smart city under the Smart Cities Mission in 2015, Chennai is implanted by various services like software, medical tourism, hardware manufacturing & financial services, petrochemicals, electronics, and pharmaceuticals. Besides providing services Chennai is also considered as a hub for most of the International brands like Accenture, Capgemini, Cognizant, Larsen & Toubro Infotech, TCS, Tech Mahindra, etc. In the 21st Century, with the enhancement of digitalization, all these major companies in Chennai use digital marketing for promoting products & services instead of traditional marketing. So, if you are undergraduates, graduates, working professionals, freelancers, or housewives living in Chennai and looking to enhance your career & develop a new skill set in digital marketing, then a digital marketing course in Chennai is the best option for you.  

Scope of Digital Marketing Jobs

Based on the data estimations calculated by the Atlas VPN, India is set to acquire over 1 billion internet users by the year 2025 and as of 2020 YTD, there are over 687.6 million internet users in India.

Source: Atlasvpn

Therefore, with the increase in internet users, the scope of digital marketing is increasing day by day as more & more companies choose to promote their business products or services with the help of digital media for exponential growth. According to the Goldman Sachs report, the digital marketing career scope alone in the Indian internet industry is predicted to be worth $160 Billion by the year 2025. In fact, the digital ad industry is expected to grow 32% to touch Rs 24,920 crore by 2021. With the growth of the digital industry, there will be a situation where lakhs of jobs will be available in the field of the digital marketing sector.  

Job Opening for Digital Marketing Domain in Chennai

There is no doubt that with the increase in the number of internet users and digital ad industry, the job opening for digital marketing domain will also increase in India mainly in the cities like Chennai, Bangalore, Hyderabad, Pune, Gurgaon and etc. So, if you are among the ones living in Chennai and want to switch your career in the field of digital marketing this is the right time for you. Choosing the digital marketing domain will not only provide you with large opportunities to work with top brands but you can also work as a freelancer, start your own business, and work from Home.  

Here is a list of major Job Opening for Digital Marketing Domain in Chennai i.e –

 

1. Digital Marketing Manager

A Digital Marketing Manager is an individual with a wide range of experience in various Digital Marketing functions like SEM, PPC, SEO, Content Marketing, or Email Marketing. To work as a Digital Marketing Manager, you will be responsible for developing, implementing, tracking, and optimizing digital marketing strategies & campaigns to promote goods, promotions, and services.

Salary Range

Source: Glassdoor Source: Glassdoor The average salary of a Digital Marketing Manager range between 4,00,000 to 18,00,000 based on experience, industry, qualification, city of residence & digital marketing certification.

2. SEO Executive & Analyst

To get a website at the top of the SERPs, most of the companies in Chennai look for digital marketers having expert knowledge in the field of SEO. As Search Engine optimizers mainly focus on the search engine like Google, Bing, and Yahoo where it is the responsibility of SEO Executives or Analyst for analyzing, implementing & optimizing websites to improve website traffic with both the on-page and off-page strategies & continuously upgrade themselves with the search engine algorithms to stay ahead of the competition and other businesses within the industry.

Salary Range

The average salary of the SEO’s with an experience of 1 – 2 years ranges approx Rs. 2,20,000 in India.

Source – Payscale

To get a high salary package as an SEO executive & Analyst it would be beneficial to have a great experience with the SEO tools like Search Console, Google Analytics, Moz, SEMrush & Ahrefs.  

3. Social Media Marketing Manager

With over 3.81 billion people using social media worldwide in 2020. The companies in Chennai will have a large opening for the social media marketing profile. A social media marketing manager is a person responsible for building a strong social presence to drive website traffic, app installs, engagement with social media. To become a social media marketer, you will have to require expert knowledge of various Social media platforms like Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Youtube &, etc including some of the SMM tools like Hootsuite, Buffer, Buzzsumo, Biteable, etc.

Salary Range

Source: Glassdoor Depending on your level of knowledge in social media marketing, social media marketers’ salary may range from Rs. 1,50,000 to 3,50,000 in India.

4. PPC Analyst or Google Adwords Manager

Known as SEM Analyst or Google Adwords Analyst, PPC Analyst is among one of the most in-demand jobs in the module of Digital Marketing. As with the help of Google Adwords, it is easy for the companies to create various types of Ads like Search Ads, Shopping Ads, Display Ads, Video Ads, and Universal App Ads to reach the audience interested in companies’ products and services. The main responsibilities of the PPC Analyst are to maintain the Paid Ad Campaigns on Google Ads like Search & Display, Bing & other Ad Network

Salary Range

With an experience of around 1 year, the salary range of a PPC Analyst/ PPC executive is approximately Rs. 2,50,000 in India where your salary can grow up to Rs. 6,00,000. If you are a fresher with a good knowledge of PPC, then you can also draw a similar pay package.

Conclusion

In India, as more and more companies are moving towards digital marketing, it is the need of the hour to learn digital marketing. Job Openings In Digital Marketing Domain In Chennai is not only limited to one single domain but is a field where you will get a huge opportunity to work as an SEO, SMM, Google Adwords, E-mail Marketing, Content Marketing and etc.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
